data.name: SimpleFontMetric
desc: describes the general metrics of a certain font.

properties.name: Ascent
desc: specifies the portion of a lower case character that rises above the height of the character \"x\" of the font.
For example, the letters \"b\", \"d\", \"h\", \"k\" and \"l\" have an ascent unequal to 0.
The ascent is measured in pixels, thus the font metric is device dependent.

properties.name: Descent
desc: specifies the portion of a letter falling below the baseline.
For example, the letters \"g\", \"p\", and \"y\" have a descent unequal to 0.
The descent is measured in pixels, thus the font metric is device dependent.

properties.name: Leading
desc: specifies the vertical space between lines of this font; it is also called internal line spacing.
The leading is measured in pixels, thus the font metric is device dependent.

properties.name: Slant
desc: specifies the slant of the characters (italic).
The slant is measured in degrees from 0 to 359.

properties.name: FirstChar
desc: specifies the code of the first printable character in the font.

properties.name: LastChar
desc: specifies the code of the last printable character in the font.
